constantValues: Association of a property definition with another entity in the system.

members.name: dynamicPropertyAssociationId

constantValues: Shows the unique identifier of the property association.

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created.

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

constantValues: Shows the object that the property is associated with.

constantValues: Shows the property that uses this option set item.

members.name: associationStatus

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows the status of the property association.

members.description: Shows the status of the property association.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'associationStatus_display' is added to the 'PropertyAssociation' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'associationStatus'
addSupportingAttribute.name: associationStatus_display

members.name: inheritanceState

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows the inheritance state in relationship to the parent property.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Shows the currency associated with the record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the currency associated with the record.
